languages.text: "В крипте фон Валанциус покоятся прошлые {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Вольные Торговцы{/g} и самые верные их слуги. Как Корабельный исповедник я свершаю обряды погребения и поминовения сих почтенных мертвецов". {n}Преподобный тяжко вздыхает.{/n} "Не думал я, что мне, старику, доведется провожать в последний путь Леди Теодору, но на все воля Его".

"The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."
languages.original_text: "В крипте фон Валанциус покоятся прошлые {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Вольные Торговцы{/g} и самые верные их слуги. Как Корабельный исповедник я свершаю обряды погребения и поминовения сих почтенных мертвецов". {n}Преподобный тяжко вздыхает.{/n} "Не думал я, что мне, старику, доведется провожать в последний путь Леди Теодору, но на все воля Его".

languages.text: «La cripta von Valancius es donde descansan los {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Comerciantes Independientes{/g} y sus sirvientes más leales. Como confesor de la nave, me corresponden los ritos del entierro y el recuerdo de estos venerables fallecidos». {n}Adalbert deja escapar un profundo suspiro.{/n} «Nunca se le pasó por la cabeza a este anciano que podría acabar enviando a lady Theodora a su último viaje, pero... tal ha sido la voluntad del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの地下墓地では、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}自由開拓者{/g}と最も忠実な使用人たちが眠る場所です。この船の司祭として、私は名誉ある死者たちの埋葬と追悼の儀式を執り行います」 {n}アダルバートは重いため息をついた。 {/n}「シオドーラ様を最後の旅に出さねばならないとは、この老人には思いもよらなかったが…すべては皇帝のご意志です」
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウスの地下墓地では、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}自由開拓者{/g}と最も忠実な使用人たちが眠る場所です。この船の司祭として、私は名誉ある死者たちの埋葬と追悼の儀式を執り行います」 {n}アダルバートは重いため息をついた。 {/n}「シオドーラ様を最後の旅に出さねばならないとは、この老人には思いもよらなかったが…すべては皇帝のご意志です」

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的地下墓穴，是历代{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}行商浪人{/g}与他们最忠诚的仆人安息的地方。身为这艘船的告解神父，我负责为这些光荣的死者举行葬礼与悼念仪式。”{n}阿达伯特沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我这把老骨头从来没想过，我竟然要送别西奥多拉夫人，带她踏上最后的旅途。不过……这一切都是神皇的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族的地下墓穴，是历代{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}行商浪人{/g}与他们最忠诚的仆人安息的地方。身为这艘船的告解神父，我负责为这些光荣的死者举行葬礼与悼念仪式。”{n}阿达伯特沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“我这把老骨头从来没想过，我竟然要送别西奥多拉夫人，带她踏上最后的旅途。不过……这一切都是神皇的旨意。”

languages.text: "Die Krypta derer von Valancius befindet sich dort, wo {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Freihändler{/g} und ihre loyalsten Diener zur Ruhe gebettet werden. Als Konfessor des Schiffs führe ich die Rituale der Bestattung und des Gedenkens für diese ehrbaren Toten durch." {n}Adalbert seufzt tief.{/n} "Es ist diesem alten Mann nie in den Sinn gekommen, dass er Lady Theodora auf ihre letzte Reise schicken muss, aber ... Alles folgt dem Willen des Imperators."
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: "Die Krypta derer von Valancius befindet sich dort, wo {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Freihändler{/g}und ihre loyalsten Diener zur Ruhe gebettet werden. Als Konfessor des Schiffs führe ich die Rituale der Bestattung und des Gedenkens für diese ehrbaren Toten durch." {n}Adalbert seufzt tief.{/n} "Es ist diesem alten Mann nie in den Sin gekommen, dass er Lady Theodora auf ihre letzte Reise schicken muss, aber ... Alles folgt dem Willen des Imperators."

languages.text: « La crypte des von Valancius est le sanctuaire où reposent les défunts {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}libres-marchands{/g} et leurs plus fidèles serviteurs. En tant que confesseur du vaisseau, je me charge d'accomplir les rites funéraires visant à honorer la mémoire de ces nobles disparus. » {n}Adalbert pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Je n'aurais jamais pensé devoir rendre un jour les derniers hommages à dame Théodora, mais... Seule compte la volonté de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: « La crypte des von Valancius est le sanctuaire où reposent les défunts {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}libres-marchands{/g} et leurs plus fidèles serviteurs. En tant que confesseur du vaisseau, je me charge d'accomplir les rites funéraires visant à honorer la mémoire de ces nobles disparus. » {n}Adalbert pousse un long soupir.{/n} « Je n'aurais jamais pensé devoir rendre un jour les derniers hommages à dame Théodora, mais... Seule compte la volonté de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Von Valancius mahzeni {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Hür Tacirlerin{/g} ve onların en sadık hizmetkârlarının ebedî istirahatlerine yattıkları yerdir. Geminin günah çıkarıcısı olarak bu şanlı merhumların gömülme ayinlerini ve anma etkinliklerini ben düzenlerim." {n}Adalbert derin derin iç çekiyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora'yı son yolculuğuna uğurlayacağı bu yaşlı adamın aklına bir kez olsun gelmemişti ama... Her şey İmparator'un iradesincedir."
languages.original_text: "The von Valancius crypt is where {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Traders{/g} and their most loyal servants are laid to rest. As the ship's confessor, I perform the rites of burial and remembrance for these honoured dead." {n}Adalbert lets out a heavy sigh.{/n} "It never occurred to this old man that he might have to send Lady Theodora on her final journey, but... All is the Emperor's will."
